Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya Saalomon Samastha Isravelin Melum Raajaavaayirundhaan.
2 avanukku Irundha Prabukkal: Saadhokkin Kumaaranaagiya Asariyaa Pradhaana Mandhiriyaayirundhaan.
3 seesaavin Kumaararaagiya Elikoreppum Agiyaavum Sambiradhigalaayirundhaargal; Agiloodhin Kumaaran Yosabaadh Mandhiriyaayirundhaan.
4 yoidhaavin Kumaaran Penaayaa Padaiththalaivanum, Saadhokkum Abiyaththaarum Aasaariyargalumaayirundhaargal.
5 naaththaanin Kumaaran Asariyaa Maniyakaararin Thalaivanaayirundhaan; Naaththaanin Kumaaran Saaboodh Raajaavin Pradhaaniyum Ishtanumaayirundhaan.
6 akeeshaar Aramanai Visaarippukkaaranum, Apthaavin Kumaaran Adhoniraam Pagudhi Visaarippukkaaranumaai Irundhaan.

7 raajaavukkum Avan Aramanaikkum Vendiya Unavupporulgalai Segarikkira Pannirandu Maniyakaarar Saalomonukku Isravel Dhesamengum Vaikkappattirundhaargal; Avargal Maadhaththukku Ovvoruvaraaga Varushamuzhuvadhum Paraamariththuvandhaargal.
8 avargal Naamangalaavana: Oorin Kumaaran, Ivan Eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththil Irundhaan.
9 thekkerin Kumaaran, Ivan Maakkaadhsilum, Saalpeemilum, Pedhshimesilum, Elonpeththaanaanilum Irundhaan.
10 esedhin Kumaaran, Ivan Arupoththil Irundhaan; Sokovum Epper Seemaiyanaiththum Ivan Visaarippil Irundhadhu.
11 abinadhaabin Kumaaran, Ivan Thorin Naattuppuramanaiththirkum Visaarippukkaaranaayirundhaan; Saalomonin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Thaabaadh Ivanukku Manaiviyaayirundhaal.

12 agiloodhin Kumaaranaagiya Paanaa, Ivan Visaarippil, Thaanaagum, Megidhovum, Sarththanaavukkup Pakkamaagavum Yesrayelukkuk Keezhaagavum Pedhseyaan Thodangi Aabel Mekollaamattum Yakmeyaamukku Appuraththumattum Irukkira Pedhseyaan Anaiththum Irundhadhu.

13 keperin Kumaaran, Ivan Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththil Irundhaan; Keeleyaaththilulla Manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Yaaveerin Graamangalum Madhilgalum Vengala Thaazhppaalgalumulla Paasaan Dhesaththinudaiya Arubadhu Periya Pattanangalulla Arkop Seemaiyum Ivan Visaarippil Irundhadhu.
14 iththovin Kumaaran Aginadhaab, Ivan Maknaayeemil Irundhaan.
15 agimaas, Ivan Napthaliyil Irundhaan; Ivan Saalomonukku Irundha Oru Kumaaraththiyaagiya Pasmaadh Enbavalai Vivaagampanninaan.
16 oosaayin Kumaaran Paanaa, Ivan Aaserilum Aaloththilum Irundhaan.
17 paruvaavin Kumaaran Yosabaadh, Ivan Isakkaaril Irundhaan.
18 elaavin Kumaaran Seemeyi, Ivan Benyameenil Irundhaan.

19 ooriyin Kumaaran Keper, Ivan Emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seekonukkum Paasaanin Raajaavaagiya Ogukkum Irundha Dhesamaagiya Keeleyaaththesaththil Irundhaan; Ivanmaaththiram Aththesaththil Adhipadhiyaai Irundhaan.
20 yoodhaavum Isravelum Kadarkarai Manalaththanai Eraalamaayirundhu, Pusiththuk Kudiththu Magizhndhukondirundhaargal.

21 nadhithodangi, Pelisthar Dhesavazhiyaai Egipthin Ellaimattum Irukkira Sagala Raajyangalaiyum Saalomon Aandukondirundhaan; Avargal Saalomonukkuk Kaanikkaigalaik Konduvandhu, Avan Uyirodirundha Naalellaam Avanai Seviththaargal.
22 naal Ondrirku Saalomonukku Sellum Saappaattu Selavu, Muppadhu Marakkaal Melliya Maavum, Arubadhu Marakkaal Maavum,
23 kalaimaangalaiyum Velimaangalaiyum Varaiyaadugalaiyum Kozhumaiyaana Paravaigalaiyum Thavira, Kozhukkappatta Paththu Maadugalum, Meychchalilirundhu Vandha Irubadhu Maadugalum Nooru Aadugalumaam.
24 nadhikku Ippuraththil Irukkira Thipsaa Mudharkondu Aasaa Mattumullavaiyellaavatraiyum, Nadhikku Ippuraththilulla Sagala Raajaakkalaiyum Aanduvandhaan; Avanai Sutri Engum Samaadhaanamaayirundhadhu.

25 saalomonudaiya Naalellaam Thaan Thuvakkip Peyersebaamattum, Yoodhaavum Isravelum Avaravar Thangal Thangal Dhraatchachchediyin Nizhalilum, Thangal Thangal Aththimaraththin Nizhalilum Sugamaaik Kudiyirundhaargal.
26 saalomonukku Naalaayiram Radhak Kudhirailaayangalum, Panneeraayiram Kudhiraiveerarum Irundhaargal.
27 mersolliya Maniyakaararil Ovvoruvarum Than Than Maadhaththile Saalomon Raajaavukkum, Raajaavin Pandhikku Varum Yaavarukkum Vendiyavaigalai Oru Kuraivumindri Paraamariththu,
28 kudhiraigalukkum Ottagangalukkum Vendiya Vaarkodhumaiyaiyum, Vaikkolaiyum, Avaravar Thangalukku Idappatta Kattalaiyinpadi Avaigal Irukkum Sthalaththirkuk Konduvaruvaargal.
29 dhevan Saalomonukku Migudhiyaana Gnaanaththaiyum Buththiyaiyum, Kadarkarai Manalaththanaiyaana Manoviruththiyaiyum Koduththaar.
30 sagala Kizhakkaththip Puththirarin Gnaanaththaiyum Egipthiyarin Sagala Gnaanaththaiyum Paarkkilum Saalomonin Gnaanam Sirandhadhaayirundhadhu.

31 avan Esraagiyanaagiya Eththaanilum, Emaan, Kalkol, Thardhaa Ennum Maagolinkumaararilum, Matra Ellaa Manusharilum Gnaanavaanaayirundhaan; Sutrilum Irundha Sagala Jaadhigalilum Avan Keerththi Prabalamaayirundhadhu.
32 avan Moovaayiram Needhimozhigalai Sonnaan; Avanudaiya Paattugal Aayiraththu Aindhu.

33 leebanonil Irukkira Kedhurumarangal Mudharkondu Suvaril Mulaikkira Eesoppup Poonduvaraikkumulla Maramudhaliya Thaabarangalaikkuriththum, Mirugangal Paravaigal Oorumpiraanigal Machchangal Aagiya Ivaigalaikkuriththum Vaakkiyangalai Sonnaan.
34 saalomonin Gnaanaththaik Kuriththuk Kelvippatta Boomiyin Sagala Raajaakkalidaththilumirundhu Naanaajaadhiyaana Janangalum Avanudaiya Gnaanaththaik Ketkiradharku Vandhaargal.
